channel.title: Compiling code help [rep++]
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I have this client now that has a file for Java files and a thing for .class files. Right now I have no compiler, I tried to make a simple one but I just failed so bad lol. Can anyone help out?
[code]@echo off :build cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -classpath Java/Animable/*.java; pause goto :build [/code]

item.title: Compiling code help [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Idk,

Try mine? :3

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Works for me,

P.S. (obviously make sure those paths are the same ones you are using :P)

Read full topic
